title: Unwanted Love
description: KateI try really try never to fall in love because all I got, in the end, is betrayal and heartbreak. My relationship with my own dad was also not based on love but on a compromise and a mere settlement that my grandfather forced on him.It was clear to me that being unwanted is written in my fate but when my path crossed with Alex my foolish heart starts burning for him at such intensity that gives me hope of my happy ending too.But my bubble was burst when Alex falls in love with my sister and marry her.For me, Alex was the love of my life but for Alex, his love was Emily and now im fighting with her ghos
author: Hanna Bans
